sourcesContent:
I'm a child component


The User id is: {{ selectedUser.id }}

The User name is: {{ selectedUser.name }}

The User email is: {{ selectedUser.email }}

not found user import {Component, OnInit} from '@angular/core'; import {IUser} from "../interfaces/app.interfaces"; import {ActivatedRoute, Params} from "@angular/router"; import {UserService} from "../user.service"; @Component({ selector: 'app-user', templateUrl: './user.component.html', styleUrls: ['./user.component.css'] }) export class UserComponent implements OnInit { selectedId: number; selectedUser: IUser; existUser: boolean = true; constructor(private route: ActivatedRoute, private userService: UserService) { } users: IUser[]; public ngOnInit(): void { this.users = this.userService.users this.selectedId = +this.route.snapshot.params['id']; this.selectedUser = this.users.find(user => user.id === this.selectedId); if (!this.selectedUser) { this.existUser = false; } this.route.params.subscribe((param: Params) =>{ this.selectedUser = this.users.find(user => user.id === +param['id']); }); } }
